DOC.brief_summary: This pilot feasibility study collect preliminary data large-scale exergaming intervention child undergoing maintenance therapy Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia ( ALL ) . Patients , age 5-17 year randomize intervention non-intervention control group . The intervention consist 30 minute session exergaming 3-5 time week 6 month , weekly assessment exercise level phone call kinesiology graduate student safety compliance . Physical activity baseline end study assess use accelerometer . Outcome measure include : anthropometrics , blood pressure , body composition , visceral fat , vascular function , fast insulin , fast glucose , LDL-cholesterol , HDL- cholesterol , triglyceride , functional mobility endurance , strength .
